item.title: Home 34
item.dc:creator: phamlam
item.content:encoded:
introducing new smart device Pro Desktop Charger For iOs & Android Connector More detail

1/3

Perfect angle

Master the angle of reading and comfortable
to read. Arc, linear match, design simple
elegant, harmony with your life

Compatibility

Fit all Type-c port cellphone, the interface
can be moved back and forth

Anti skid base

The base is made of silica gel, this design
effectively prevents the slide. Let you charge
more secure

Fast & safe charging

With intelligent protective design quickly
charging speed as well as convenient

Two-way High-speed transmission of data

With intelligent protective design quickly
charging speed as well as convenient Learn More

5 color options

Select the perfect color

Why wait? Order yours now.

And get 10%off your first order

Order Now
